name: Corruption (itch) (Key Slam Games)
description:
Embark on an adventure to cleanse the vile corruption spreading through the peaceful forest of Eastrot. An inhabitant of the forest, a faun, is chosen to cleanse the forest by its ancient guardian, Maplebeard.

You take on the role of a faun that lives in what used to be a thriving forest. Something's not quite right anymore, the forest is changing. Eastrot used to be a peaceful woodland, filled with life. But is slowly turning into a dark, quiet place due to a mysterious infection. 

The Guardian of the forest, Maplebeard, has entrusted you to cure the forest from the mysterious corruption. You must cleanse the forest before the infection has consumed everything in its path.


  • Play as a faun and overcome obstacles  
  • Solve unique and imaginative puzzles
  • Experience a rich storyline, while exploring the corrupted forest 
  • Behold an entirely 2D-illustrated and atmospheric world

Corruption is a 2D puzzle platformer game. Explore the forest while overcoming obstacles with features like jumping, climbing, and lifting objects.

Collect corruption orbs to cure the forest and unlock more abilities throughout the gameplay as the journey gets increasingly difficult. 


Corruption is a game created by eight people, so who are we?
